item.title: It's very obvious from the outside. but Christianity and conservative politics are conflated all the time in white evangelical churches that they don't realize their faith has been co-opted by nationalism #christiannationalism #exvangelical #charliekirk #

item.title: humor is how I cope. if this is you, you're not alone. pull that string and ask yourself "if I was so sure about this but was wrong, what else do I believe that is wrong?" there is freedom and hope on the other side ðŸ©· #christianhumor #exvangelical #raptur

item.title: just some post rapture thoughts. I laugh about it because humor is how I cope and it is a silly thing to believe BUT there is real pain and trauma that comes with it and I want to hold grace for those really struggling right now because that was once me.
